snippet: A court-ordered mediation meeting on Monday could determine the future of the Museum of Contemporary Art in North Miami.
abstract: Museum of Contemporary Art in North Miami, Fla, is embroiled in dispute with city following proposed merger with Bass Museum of Art in Miami Beach and plan to move museum's collection there; conflict encompasses issues of whether museum should be allowed to leave North Miami and who its true director is.

byline.original: By SEAN McCAUGHAN and PATRICIA COHEN
byline.contributor: Sean McCaughan reported from North Miami and Patricia Cohen from New York.

lead_paragraph: A court-ordered mediation meeting on Monday could determine the future of the Museum of Contemporary Art in North Miami.

headline.seo: Museum of Contemporary Art in North Miami Is in Turmoil
headline.main: Museum Power Squabble Borders on the Surreal
headline.print_headline: Museum Power Squabble Borders on the Surreal
